Control Name: SC-8 (3) CRYPTOGRAPHIC PROTECTION FOR MESSAGE EXTERNALS
Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect message externals unless otherwise protected by [Assignment: organization-defined alternative physical safeguards].
